Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for the database, including data model, scalability needs, consistency levels, and throughput requirements.
Design the database schema and partitioning strategy to optimize performance and scalability. Define indexing policies and consistency levels.
Choose the appropriate API type for the Cosmos DB instance (e.g., SQL, MongoDB, Cassandra, Gremlin, Table) based on application requirements.
Create a new Azure Cosmos DB account in the Azure portal, specifying the desired region(s) for data replication and availability.
Set up global distribution for the database to ensure high availability and low latency for users across different regions.
Enable security features such as IP firewall rules, private endpoints, and encryption at rest. Configure role-based access control (RBAC) for database access.

Tasks.Task: Set Up Backup and Restore Policies
Tasks.Task Description: Configure backup policies to ensure data recovery in case of accidental deletion or corruption. Test restore procedures to validate backup integrity.
Configure throughput settings and indexing policies to optimize database performance based on workload requirements.
Set up monitoring for key metrics such as request units (RUs), latency, and availability using Azure Monitor and Application Insights.
Simulate failover scenarios to ensure the database remains available and consistent during regional outages.
Create detailed documentation for the database setup, including architecture, security configurations, and operational procedures.
Provide training sessions for the operations team on managing, monitoring, and troubleshooting the Azure Cosmos DB setup.
Conduct regular audits to ensure compliance with security and performance standards. Review configurations and update as needed.
Periodically review and optimize indexing policies to ensure efficient query performance and cost management.
Monitor usage patterns and adjust the provisioned throughput (RUs) to meet application demands while optimizing costs.
Analyze query performance metrics and optimize queries to reduce latency and resource consumption.
Ensure that applications using Azure Cosmos DB are updated to the latest SDKs and APIs to leverage new features and security updates.
Evaluate the partitioning strategy to ensure optimal distribution of data and efficient scaling.
Perform regular compliance checks to ensure Azure Cosmos DB adheres to organizational and regulatory requirements.
Conduct incident response drills to prepare for potential security incidents or database outages. Ensure familiarity with procedures and protocols.
Review Azure Cosmos DB usage and costs to identify opportunities for optimization and cost savings.
